action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to repeal the authorities of the Government Accountability Office with respect to the District of Columbia government, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Government Accountability Office District of Columbia Home Rule Act.

section.header: Repeal of authorities of Government Accountability Office over District of Columbia Government
